mapper.insert: insert into place (co_id, pl_name, pl_description, pl_opendays, pl_start, pl_end, pl_addinfo, address_id) values (#{companyId}, #{name}, #{description}, #{placeOpen}, #{placeStartTime}, #{placeEndTime}, #{placeAddInfo}, #{addressId})
mapper.update: update place set pl_name=#{updateParam.placeName}, pl_description=#{updateParam.placeDescription}, pl_opendays=#{updateParam.businessDays}, pl_start=#{updateParam.placeOpenTime}, pl_end=#{updateParam.placeCloseTime}, pl_addinfo=#{updateParam.addInformation}, address_id=#{updateParam.addressId}
